ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_hmopf | |- ( T e. HrmOp -> T : ~H --> ~H ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eleigveccl | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> A e. ~H ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eigvalcl | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_jca | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( A e. ~H /\ ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. CC ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eigvec1 | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( ( T ` A ) = ( ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) .h A ) /\ A =/= 0h ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_jca | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( ( A e. ~H /\ ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. CC ) /\ ( ( T ` A ) = ( ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) .h A ) /\ A =/= 0h ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( ( A e. ~H /\ ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. CC ) /\ ( ( T ` A ) = ( ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) .h A ) /\ A =/= 0h ) ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( A e. ~H /\ A e. ~H ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( A e. ~H /\ A e. ~H ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_hmop | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ A e. ~H /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( A .ih ( T ` A ) ) = ( ( T ` A ) .ih A ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ ( A e. ~H /\ A e. ~H ) ) -> ( A .ih ( T ` A ) ) = ( ( T ` A ) .ih A ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( A .ih ( T ` A ) ) = ( ( T ` A ) .ih A ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eigre | |- ( ( ( A e. ~H /\ ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. CC ) /\ ( ( T ` A ) = ( ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) .h A ) /\ A =/= 0h ) ) -> ( ( A .ih ( T ` A ) ) = ( ( T ` A ) .ih A ) <-> ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. RR ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( ( ( A e. ~H /\ ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. CC ) /\ ( ( T ` A ) = ( ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) .h A ) /\ A =/= 0h ) ) /\ ( A .ih ( T ` A ) ) = ( ( T ` A ) .ih A ) ) -> ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 15 | 7, 12, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( T e. HrmOp /\ A e. ( eigvec ` T ) ) -> ( ( eigval ` T ) ` A ) e. RR ) |
